titles.title: When My Blest Lord Will Come Again

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When my blest Lord will come again, I will be saved from all my pain, With all the saints I'll follow Him, O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord! With all the saints I'll follow Him, O praise the Lord!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When I shall see Him face to face, And dwell with Him through endless days, I will rejoice and sing His grace, O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord! I will rejoice and sing His grace, O paise the Lord!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When I meet Him before the Throne, My suff'rings then will all be gone, The joy of vict'ry will be won, O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord! O Praise the Lord! The joy of vict'ry will be won, O praise the Lord!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In that day I will testify, That nothing with Christ's life can vie, What glorious rapture to the sky, O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord! What glorious rapture to the sky, O praise the Lord!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May we in our Lord's side e'er hide, Be always one and ne'er divide, That His heart may be satisfied, O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord! That His heart may be satisfied, O praise the Lord!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O come, our King, O come dear Lord! Receive us by Thy promised word, And give the victors Thy reward, O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord! And give the victors Thy reward O praise the Lord!{/lang-eng}
